Our overall knowledge of the Iraqi CW program is primarily limited to infrastructure& doctrine. The specific agent and facility knowledge is 60-70 percent incomplete, the report stated. U.S. intelligence could confirm the identity of most facilities that contributed to ballistic missile production, the report states.
